actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 6056 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow tax-exempt private foundations to treat as confidential, and not to list in required annual reports, the name and address of any indigent or needy recipient of charitable gifts or grants amounting to $1000 or less during the taxable year.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 6056 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954.
